product_name: Living ProofNo Frizz Instant De-Frizzer Dry Conditioning Spray
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackLiving Proof No Frizz Instant De-frizzer is a dry conditioning spray that instantly tames up to 92% of frizz, leaving hair softer, smoother, and shinier.
details: DetailsBenefitsInstantly tames up to 92% of frizzAdds instant shine and softnessSmooths hair without buildupReplenishes hair's natural oilsBoosts manageabilityProvides UV and static protectionFor frizz-prone hair typesBest for medium to thick hair typesSafe for color and chemically-treated hairFree of silicones, SLES and SLS, parabens, phthalates and glutenKey IngredientsAmaranth seed extract: Replenishes hair’s lipids and helps block humidity to provide frizz protectionBiomimetic 5-oil blend: Replenishes hair’s natural lipidsHigh-gloss emollient: Enhances shineCationic conditioning agent: Helps to make hair softer and more manageableItem 2523557How To UseFor medium to thick hair, hold canister 6-10" away and spray on dry hair in a sweeping motion. Smooth hair with hands or comb.For fine hair, focus on applying from mid-lengths to ends.To spot treat, spray in hand and apply to specific sections.IngredientsHydrofluorocarbon 152a, Alcohol Denat., Isohexadecane, Isododecane, PPG-5-Ceteth-20, Propylene Glycol Dibenzoate, Diisopropyl Sebacate, C13-15 Alkane, Amaranthus Caudatus Seed Extract, Isopropyl Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Linoleamidopropyl Dimethylamine Dimer Dilinoleate, Diisostearyl Malate, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Orbignya Oleifera Seed Oil, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Oleyl Alcohol, Fragrance/Parfum, Citronellol, Citral, Linalool, Limonene, Geraniol, Coumarin.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: For medium to thick hair, hold canister 6-10" away and spray on dry hair in a sweeping motion. Smooth hair with hands or comb.For fine hair, focus on applying from mid-lengths to ends.To spot treat, spray in hand and apply to specific sections.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I've been using this stuff for years abd always have a bottle on hand. I have fine wavy hair and use this anytime I want my hair to look softer, tame frizz or scrunch out the crunch if I styled it wavy with gel. No one ever talks about it but I love it. Warning, the scent is super strong so you have to hold your breath when using it, but a small price for me to pay for how well it works.

reviews.headline: Too heavy for baby fine hair..
reviews.comments: I was looking for Bumble and Bumble but Ulta does not carry the dry oil finishing spray any more. The sales associate suggested this to tame the baby fine fly away hair.  This product is way too heavy for my hair so it has been returned.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I don't know what is in this to make it so effective but I bought this on a whim a few years ago and have used it every day of styling my hair since. It works so well to tame flyaways and just make your hair look better. I'm caucasian with generally straight hair and curl it or straighten that depending on the day and this is a HG product for me. It's not like an oil or serum. It's kind of just like a hairspray. I will always buy this

reviews.headline: soft & gently shapes my fine hair
reviews.comments:
I regularly purchase this hair product because it works as stated! love it
♥️

reviews.headline: Doesn't help with frizz
reviews.comments: Doesn't work.  Nice smell but does nothing for frizz.

reviews.headline: Love it!!!
reviews.comments: Gives hair a smooth shine. Takes away frizzing smells good and allows me to style, anyway, I need to. Very light would buy again the minute I am near running out!!!!

reviews.headline: Don't love it
reviews.comments: I wouldn't recommend this product, it smells really bad. There are many more products out there that do the same thing but without the bad smell.

reviews.headline: AMAZING PRODUCT
reviews.comments: As someone who has fine hair, I need to he careful with what serum/oils I add to my hair when it comes to frizz after styling my hair. I love how light this is and so easy. Just spray onto hair and you are done. No greassiness. It is scented heavily like but I love it and the smell is so fancy and mature, nothing sweet, clean or floraly. My favorite product.

reviews.headline: Scent is overwhelming
reviews.comments: Did control frizz but it makes my hair feel weighted down. I can't get over the smell, I will be returning.

reviews.headline: Worked for Me
reviews.comments: I have tried other humidity control sprays and didn't get good results.  This one made a difference.  I used in conjunction with Redken Frizz Dismiss Shampoo,Redken Frizz Dismiss Conditioner and Redken Frizz Dismiss Styling Cream

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I have extremely frizzy hair and this tames without extra oil or wieghing my hair down. I highly recommend

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I have extremely frizzy hair and this tames without extra oil or wieghing my hair down. I highly recommend

reviews.headline: Highly recommended
reviews.comments: I have frizzy thin hair. Anytime I straighten it, my fly aways are out of control. This spray is  definite must. Works so well. Highly recommend.

reviews.headline: Does not work
reviews.comments: I bought this hoping it would help with the frizz I always have with my natural curls. It didn't do anything at all, unfortunately.

reviews.headline: Love the quality, availability, and smell.
reviews.comments: Hope our Ulta stocks this brand regularly.

reviews.headline: I would buy it again
reviews.comments: This product works great .I just wish it had a better scent .

reviews.headline: Winter static savior!
reviews.comments: This is my savior for winter static and flyaways. I have fine thin hair which I air dry. Followed the suggested uses by spraying a little in my hand and smoothing over the flyaways and voila! Problem solved.

reviews.headline: Looks Healthy and Sleek
reviews.comments: I have been using this product and it makes my hair look like I got a keratin treatment. Its so beautiful, looks jumpy, shiny and has life. I add alot of it from root to ends before and after i flat iron it to make sure i get all my strands and my frizz!  I asked my hairdresser to reccomend me products to take care of it!!!! and he Changed my whole Life!!! Dont be afraid to ask someone to help!!!

reviews.headline: My Favorite LP product!!!
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this stuff!! I can't live without it! I just spray a few squirts in my morning routine and sometimes through out the day. Especially in the heat and humidity when my hair wants to frizz up. LP shampoo & conditioner are good too. But this is my favorite!!

reviews.headline: Love this for my hair
reviews.comments:
I love this product (but, not the price)
     it's hard to describe what this amazing product does to my hair. it makes it super soft & sorta together but, not like a stuff hairspray.
❤️

faceoff_positive.comments: Works very well with the very dry ends of my hair. You need only a small amount--about the size of a pea--it costs nearly $20, but lasts a very long time. It says to use on wet hair, which works well. Sometimes I use it on the top of my head where my hair gets especially frizzy and dry--I wet my hands and rub on the top layer of hair. Then I wet my hands again and add a small amount of conditioner and rub my hands together to make the conditioner thinner so that it spreads better. I rub this on the damp hair, at it brings it back to life. Sometimes when hairspray gunks up my bangs, I wash just my bangs, then use a tiny amount of conditioner. It works like a charm. I am reviewing this product as part of contest.
faceoff_positive.headline: Living proof de-frizzer

faceoff_negative.comments:
I went to the @livingproofinc aisle to a quick #DefrizzAtUlta and tamed my hair with a nice and fresh scent, that not only lasted through my flight but also got the work done for a few hours.

What I liked the most about this product is that it felt weightless on my hair and had a fresh and almost unnoticeable scent. This product is super easy to use, just spray it wherever you need it and you're done.

The packaging, the price are nice; boring but nice. My hair looked super tamed and a bit dull after one use and felt surprisingly soft. 

To be honest, I would like a Dry Shampoo version of the Living Proof Instant De-frizzer, for an even better result on girls that doesn't have time at all or have greasy hair, because the long term result is a bit messy... What I didn't liked about it is that it made my hair look greasy a few hours after I applied the product. 

Pro tip: it worked better, with a longwearing result when I applied baby powder to the roots of my hair before applying the Instant De-Frizzer. You can use makeup setting powder as well. 

Although this is my honest review, I must confess that I'm taking part on a contest.
faceoff_negative.headline: The effect wont last more than 4 hours.

rollup.name: No Frizz Instant De-Frizzer Dry Conditioning Spray
